name: Runner Escape
description:
Frank is a runner, but not just any runner. He belongs to an exclusive group of humans capable of running at extreme speeds, they are the only ones capable of going out to look for resources in an already destroyed world. You must survive using your abilities to dodge obstacles and reach extreme speeds.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Frank es un corredor, pero no cualquier corredor. Pertenece a un exclusivo grupo de humanos capaces de correr a velocidades extremas, son los únicos capaces de salir a buscar recursos en un mundo ya destruido. Debe sobrevivir usando sus habilidades para esquivar los obstáculos y alcanzar velocidades extremas.
